@graph.name: So, Shopify is Mad About Your Cloudflare Proxy? Here’s How to Fix It.
@graph.description: This Shopify error means your domain’s DNS settings use an unsupported proxy. Shopify requires a direct DNS connection to verify your domain. Cloudflare’s proxy feature, the orange cloud, blocks this connection. To fix this issue, you must disable the proxy within your Cloudflare DNS settings by turning the cloud grey. That error message. “Your domain […]

step.name: Get to Your Cloudflare DNS Settings
step.text: Log in to Cloudflare, click the domain you're trying to use for Shopify, find the 'DNS' icon in the menu on the left and click it

step.name: Turn Off the Proxy for the A Record
step.text: Find the 'A' record in your list, make sure the 'Content' IP address is Shopify's: 23.227.38.65, click the orange cloud to turn it grey

step.name: Turn Off the Proxy for the 'www' CNAME Record
step.text: Find the 'CNAME' record with 'Name' as www, ensure 'Content' is shops.myshopify.com, click the orange cloud to turn it grey

step.name: Go Back to Shopify and Verify
step.text: Go to your Shopify admin panel, navigate to Settings > Domains, click on the domain that had the error, and click 'Verify connection'

mainEntity.name: Wait, but doesn't Shopify use Cloudflare itself? This is confusing.

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, it does! Shopify uses a special, high-end enterprise version of Cloudflare that's built right into its platform. When you run your domain through your own free, personal Cloudflare account with the proxy on, you're creating a conflict with their built-in system.

mainEntity.name: What's the one setting that causes all the trouble?

acceptedAnswer.text: The proxy setting. The orange cloud. That's it. It's the root of all evil in this specific scenario. You have to change it to 'DNS Only,' which is the grey cloud, so your domain connects properly.

mainEntity.name: How do I fix this again, real quick?

acceptedAnswer.text: Log into Cloudflare. Go to DNS. Find the A record and the www CNAME record. Click the orange cloud next to each one to make it turn grey. Go back to Shopify and click 'Verify connection.' Done.

@graph.name: Orange Cloud
@graph.description: Cloudflare's proxy feature that actively routes traffic through Cloudflare's network for caching and security

@graph.name: Grey Cloud
@graph.description: DNS Only mode in Cloudflare that acts as a phonebook, pointing domain names to IP addresses without proxying traffic

@graph.name: A Record
@graph.description: DNS record that points a domain name directly to an IP address

@graph.name: CNAME Record
@graph.description: DNS record that points a subdomain to another domain name

@graph.name: Double-caching
@graph.description: When two CDN systems cache the same content, potentially causing outdated information to be served
